remarks: The left group action of element ` A ` of group ` G ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Mar-2008.)
statement:
grplact.1 $e |- F = ( g e. X |-> ( a e. X |-> ( g .+ a ) ) ) $.
grplact.2 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
grplactfval $p |- ( A e. X -> ( F ` A ) = ( a e. X |-> ( A .+ a ) ) ) $.
$d .+ a g $.
$d A a g $.
$d G a g $.
$d X a g $.
